price: N’abantu bo mu bwoko bw’aba Adi twaboherereje umuvandimwe wabo Hudu, aravuga ati “Yemwe bantu banjye! Nimugaragire Allah! Nta yindi mana mufite ikwiye gusengwa itari We. Nta kindi muri cyo uretse kuba abahimba ibinyoma.”
arabic: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُودٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۖ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا مُفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-ilā ʿādin akhāhum hūdan qāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu in antum illā muf'tarūna
